meanings.definition: Not conforming to the standards or practices of a profession.
meanings.sent1: The team's unprofessionals behavior during the meeting was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: It is important to hire skilled professionals, not unprofessionals, for this job.
meanings.sent3: The unprofessionals attire of the new employee raised a few eyebrows.
meanings.sent4: Her unprofessionals approach to the project left a trail of mistakes behind.
meanings.sent5: The unprofessionals conduct of the salesperson cost the company a valuable client.

meanings.definition: A person who is not a professional.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to hire unprofessionals to save on costs.
meanings.sent2: She was surrounded by unprofessionals who lacked the necessary skills.
meanings.sent3: The group of unprofessionals tried their best to fix the issue, but failed.
meanings.sent4: He stood out among the unprofessionals with his exceptional work ethic.
meanings.sent5: The team of unprofessionals struggled to meet the project deadline.
